products.title: Premium A4 Brazilian Jiu Jitsu Gi - White
products.description: High-quality pearl weave gi with reinforced stitching. IBJJF approved. Includes matching pants with rope drawstring and durable knee reinforcements. Pre-shrunk 100% cotton construction for lasting fit.

products.title: Compression Rashguard Long Sleeve - Black
products.description: No-gi training essential with moisture-wicking fabric and flatlock seams. Anti-microbial treatment prevents odor. Four-way stretch material allows full range of motion. Sublimated graphics won't crack or peel.

products.title: Fight Shorts - Navy Blue
products.description: Lightweight and flexible MMA-style shorts perfect for no-gi training. Side slits for mobility, Velcro and drawstring closure. Moisture-wicking polyester blend. Reinforced stitching on stress points.

products.title: BJJ Rank Belt - Blue A3
products.description: Official IBJJF standard cotton belt with black bar for stripe patches. Durable construction maintains shape through countless training sessions. Pre-washed to minimize shrinkage. Includes care instructions.

products.title: Compression Spats - Black with Red Panels
products.description: Full-length grappling tights with ergonomic paneling for maximum performance. Reinforced waistband won't roll down during training. Quick-dry fabric with UPF 50+ sun protection. Ideal for gi or no-gi.

products.title: Knee Pads - Compression Sleeve (Pair)
products.description: 7mm neoprene knee sleeves provide support and protection during takedowns and guard work. Non-slip interior keeps pads in place. Breathable design prevents overheating. Sold as pair.

products.title: Ear Guards - Adjustable Wrestling Headgear
products.description: Prevent cauliflower ear with these comfortable, low-profile ear guards. Adjustable straps ensure secure fit. Soft chin cup and lightweight design won't restrict movement. Easy to clean.

products.title: Gi and Gear Duffel Bag - 60L
products.description: Spacious gym bag with ventilated compartments to keep wet gi separate. Multiple pockets for accessories. Padded shoulder strap and reinforced handles. Water-resistant base protects against wet floors.

products.title: Custom Moldable Mouthguard
products.description: Boil-and-bite mouthguard provides superior protection during sparring. Dual-layer construction absorbs impact. Includes ventilation channels for easy breathing. Comes with protective case.

products.title: Grappling Dummy - 70lbs Unfilled
products.description: Train submissions and positions at home with this durable canvas dummy. Reinforced stitching handles intense drilling. Sitting position with hands extended. Ships unfilled - fill with textile scraps or sand.
